divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside aug.13 about 5:30 and i took my dogs out i looked to the southwest and they had a star and bunch of blinking lights going on it would start like top, to side to bottom to top to the left side and so on, the bext day i went out and i looked to the north east an dthey had a simmilar thing going on, it was there for about an hr then it was gone. i thought i was kind of strange cause i never saw something like that before cause iam always up that early letting my dogs outside and never saw that before. what made me first notice it is that when iam outside iam always looking in the sky. they had no motion just the blinking lights around the star. i di dnot get up early that sat. cause i over slept but for 2 days in a row it was there but at different locations.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Crowley
There were no other sightings in Crowley on or around August 13th 2009
